role_description: Advance team: reconnaissance and early road closure at A16 motorway start
Static protection team securing N209 to A12 transition junction
Rear security team covering A12 approach to The Hague

Reserve team positioned at Hubertus Viaduct for reinforcement

Counter-sniper overwatch on Hubertus Viaduct - highest vulnerability point
Counter-sniper team covering Konnningskade urban approach
Counter-sniper team covering S100 junction and Mauritshuis reception
